definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to ask sb to carefully consider a request (idiom)

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面僅就已觀察到的幾種傘形科植物的反應予以說明。

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，編輯看第一句話就拒絕予以發表。

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 將集團內的不良業務剔除，好過爲了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 並且對於易受傷害患者予以優先照顧和妥善保護。

sentences.english: I was gratified at the attendance to my talk, and the enthusiastic response.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆對我的發言予以熱烈的響應，令我深感榮幸。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免費塑料袋，不論以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: So in found that people with tonsillitis shall be timely treatment should be.
sentences.chinese: 因此在發現患有扁桃體炎時應及時予以治療。

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 經商標局覈准後，發給註冊人相應證明，並予以公告。

sentences.english: And certain high-risk professions and hobbies usually have to be disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 某些高風險職業和業餘愛好通常也必須予以說明澄清。

sentences.english: We thank you for your order, which have be putted in work at once.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您的訂單，我們立即予以執行。

sentences.english: The government's refusal was couched in unfriendly language.
sentences.chinese: 該政府以不友好的語言予以拒絕。

sentences.english: Adamaged or leaking battery should not be transported.
sentences.chinese: 已損壞或泄漏的電池不能予以運輸。

sentences.english: Once school-related fears of children was diagnosed, the treatment that given early would achieve better effects.
sentences.chinese: 一旦確診兒童學校恐怖症，早期予以治療則療效較好。

sentences.english: The deviation made by the wind could be straightened by the computer.
sentences.chinese: 由風引起的偏差可由計算機予以校正。

sentences.english: Where a crime is committed as mentioned in any Article of this Decision, all his earnings and property illegally obtained shall be confiscated;
sentences.chinese: 犯本決定各條罪的，其違法所得的一切財物予以沒收。

sentences.english: The customs may publish the failure of taxpayers to pay duty.
sentences.chinese: 海關可以對納稅義務人欠繳稅款的情況予以公告。

definition: in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

to put out/to come up with/to make (a choice, decision, proposal, response, comment etc)/to issue (a permit, statement, explanation, apology, reassurance to the public etc)/to draw (conclusion)/to deliver (speech, judgment)/to devise (explanation)/to extract
to order/to enjoin/to charge/to instruct sb to finish sth
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
